name: Moving Out
summary: Moving Out is a ridiculous physics-based moving simulator that brings new meaning to "couch co-op"! Are you ready for an exciting career in furniture? As a newly certified Furniture Arrangement & Relocation Technician, you’ll take on moving jobs all across the busy town of Packmore.
info:
• 中文名: 胡闹搬家
  • 发行: Team17
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 平台: Nintendo Switch
  • 游戏类型: Physics-based moving simulator
  • 游玩人数: 1 - 4人
  • 发行日期: 2020年4月28日
  • 开发: SMG Studio, Devm Games
